com.ephesoft.dcma.docassembler.classification

Interface DocumentClassification

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    AutomaticClassification, BarcodeClassification, ImageClassification, SearchablePdfClassification, SearchClassification

    public interface DocumentClassification
    This class does the actual processing of document assembly. It will read all the pages of the document type Unknown and then create new documents for all these pages found.
    Version:
    1.0
    Author:
    Ephesoft
    See Also:
    DocumentAssembler

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void processDocumentTypes(DocumentAssembler documentAssembler, java.lang.String batchInstanceIdentifer, java.lang.String batchClassIdentifier, java.util.List<Document> documentList)
      Processes passed document list and does reclassification for each document.
      void processUnclassifiedPages(DocumentAssembler documentAssembler, java.lang.String batchInstanceIdentifierIdentifier, PluginPropertiesService pluginPropertiesService)
      This method will process all the unclassified pages present at document type Unknown.

    • Method Detail

      • processUnclassifiedPages

        void processUnclassifiedPages(DocumentAssembler documentAssembler,
                            java.lang.String batchInstanceIdentifierIdentifier,
                            PluginPropertiesService pluginPropertiesService)
                              throws DCMAApplicationException
        This method will process all the unclassified pages present at document type Unknown. Process every page one by one and create new documents.
        Parameters:
        documentAssembler - DocumentAssembler
        batchInstanceID - Long
        Throws:
        DCMAApplicationException - If any invalid parameter found.

      • processDocumentTypes

        void processDocumentTypes(DocumentAssembler documentAssembler,
                        java.lang.String batchInstanceIdentifer,
                        java.lang.String batchClassIdentifier,
                        java.util.List<Document> documentList)
                          throws DCMAApplicationException
        Processes passed document list and does reclassification for each document. Reclassification is done for documents whose document type information not present.
        Parameters:
        batchInstanceIdentifer -
        batchClassIdentifier -
        documentList -
        Throws:
        DCMAApplicationException
